EmailTemplate.name: AMEA_Order Acknowledgement
EmailTemplate.subject: Illumina Order Acknowledgment: PO #
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Illumina - Order Recieved
View My Account
Hello,
Thank you for sending us your purchase order. We are currently reviewing your order and will contact you if we have any questions.
We will email you an order confirmation within 1–2 business days.
If you would like to save time, please consider placing future orders online. Your MyIllumina account allows you to conveniently:
Add products to your cart or redeem a quote Create scheduled shipments Favorite products to save for easy re-ordering View order history, track order status, and print invoices Share your cart with your colleagues Download latest product catalog with your pricing
To create your MyIllumina account, register online today. For any assistance with your account, please contact Customer Service with the phone number listed below.
Thank you for your business.
Illumina Customer Support Team Singapore: 65.6773.0188 Australia (Free Call): 1800.775 688 New Zealand (Toll Free): 0800 451 650 Korea (Toll Free): 003086511432 www.illumina.com
Need a MyIllumina account? Register today in less than 30 seconds »
